IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: CARE FOR, EDUCATE, AND MEDICALLY CARE FOR POVERTY-STRICKEN CHILDREN, WIDOWS, FAMILIES, AND COMMUNITIES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: CARE FOR, EDUCATE, HOUSE, AND MEDICALLY CARE FOR POVERTY-STRICKEN CHILDREN, WIDOWS, FAMILIES, AND COMMUNITIES, INCLUDING THE PREVENTION AND RESCUE OF HUMAN TRAFFICKING VICTIMS, WITHIN THE UNITED STATES AND IN DEVELOPING NATIONS WORLDWIDE.
IRS990.Desc: THE CARE AND EDUCATION OF POOR, ORPHANED, AND ABANDONED CHILDREN IN GUATEMALA, EL SALVADOR, INDIA, AFRICA, AND THE UNITED STATES. ALSO, TO PROVIDE HEALTH CARE, HEALTH CARE EDUCATION AND GENERAL EDUCATION TO IMPOVERISHED FAMILIES, CHILDREN AND BABIES SUFFERING FROM MALNUTRITION. THE SINGLE LARGEST EXPENSE WAS FOR THE CARE AND EDUCATION OF POOR, ORPHANED, AND ABANDONED CHILDREN IN GUATEMALA.

AccountActivitiesOutsideUSGrp.TypeOfActivitiesConductedTxt: GRANTS TO RECIPIENTS LOCATED IN THE REGION

GrantsToOrgOutsideUSGrp.PurposeOfGrantTxt: TO ASSIST WITH THE CARE AND EDUCATION OF POOR, ORPHANED, AND ABANDONED CHILDREN IN GUATEMALA AND EL SALVADOR.

ForeignIndividualsGrantsGrp.TypeOfAssistanceTxt: TO ASSIST WITH THE CARE AND EDUCATION OF POOR, ORPHANED, AND ABANDONED CHILDREN IN GUATEMALA AND EL SALVADOR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A REPRESENTATIVE OF THE ORGANIZATION (PATRICK ATKINSON) IS ON-SITE IN THE REGION AND WORKS CLOSELY WITH THE GRANT RECIPIENT ORGANIZATION TO ENSURE THAT THE GRANT IS USED FOR THE ELIGIBLE PURPOSES. ALL GRANT REQUESTS ARE SUBMITTED THROUGH THE REPRESENTATIVE AND DETERMINATION IS MADE THAT THE REQUESTED USE IS IN COMPLIANCE WITH THE ORGANIZATION'S TAX EXEMPT PURPOSE. ALL FUNDS ARE ELECTRONICALLY SENT DIRECTLY TO THE ELIGIBLE ORGANIZATION TO PREVENT THEM FROM BEING MISDIRECTED. THE ORGANIZATION'S REPRESENTATIVE REPORTS TO THE FULL BOARD OF DIRECTORS THE PROGRAMS AND SERVICES BEING PROVIDED AND FUNDED THROUGH THE GRANTS.

LoansBtwnOrgInterestedPrsnGrp.LoanPurposeTxt: INTEREST ACCRUING ON PREVIOUSLY EARNED WAGES NOT PAID

BusTrInvolveInterestedPrsnGrp.RelationshipDescriptionTxt: OPERATIONS AND MANAGEMENT OF DOMUS SAME AS GOD'S CHILD. SAME BOD

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TWO MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS ARE MARRIED TO EACH OTHER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COPY IS PROVIDED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS FOR THEIR REVIEW AND APPROVAL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: REGULAR MONITORING BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR. ANY CONFLICTS THAT ARISE ARE BROUGHT TO THE ATTENTION OF THE FULL BOARD. IF A BOARD MEMBER IS INVOLVED THEY ABSTAIN FROM ANY DISCUSSION AND VOTE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMPENSATION FOR THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR IS DETERMINED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS BASED UPON PERFORMANCE, REVIEW, CURRENT ECONOMIC CONDITIONS AND COMPENSATION FOR COMPARABLE POSITIONS. COMPENSATION FOR KEY EMPLOYEES IS DETERMINED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND APPROVED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION WILL MAKE ITS FORM 990 AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC FOR INSPECTION UPON REQUEST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: UPON REQUEST THE ORGANIZATION WILL PROVIDE ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS TO THE PUBLIC.
THE PROCEDURE HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PREVIOUS YEAR.
